name: Fullday trekking Thon Tha
description: Tha Village is a village located at an estimate of 6 kilometers away from the center of the city of Ha Giang, Northern Vietnam. For someone who loves trekking and exploring places with beautiful sceneries but not far away from the city, Tha Village is the best place to go to. The village is just small that you can just walk around it. The people in Tha village are under the Tay Ethnic Group.
